attributes.action: Allow students who study in the arts to go back to university earlier
attributes.additional_details: By not allowing people in the arts to go back, it is hindering our ability to practice performing. Many students come from poorer background with insufficient space to practice and move about. therefore, they are unable to join in with dance classes. Some students aren’t allowed to sing too loud due to strict families or neighbours and some people don’t have access to all the tech to provide a decent sound quality and video quality during classes
attributes.background: As someone who studies musical theatre, I fail to see how my course and many other arts degrees don’t fall into the list of degrees that will go back on the 5th January. Thus we ask that the government allow us to go back so we can advance in our degrees

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/558252

We're sorry for how long it took us to check your petition.
